Package shared.proxy.moves

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptTrade
    Used to accept or decline a domestic trade
    BuildCity
    Used to build a city at a specified location.
    BuildRoad
    Used to build a road at a specified location
    BuildSettlement
    Used to build a settlement at a specified location.
    BuyDevCard
    Used to buy a development card
    comEdgeLoc  
    comVertexLoc  
    DiscardCards
    Used to discard specified resource cards
    FinishMove
    Lets the server know that a player's turn has ended.
    MaritimeTrade
    Communication object (wrapper) used to execute a Maritime trade
    Monopoly_
    Used to play a "Monopoly" card from the hand
    Monument_
    Used to play a "Monument" card from your hand to get a victory point.
    OfferTrade
    Used to offer a domestic trade to another player
    ResourceList
    Used to offer trades
    Road_Building_
    Used to play a "Road Building" card from your hand
    RobPlayer
    Moves the robber, selecting the new position and player to rob
    RollNumber
    Class used to inform the server that a player has and what a player has rolled
    SendChat
    Wrapper for determining what message is to be sent and which User sent it
    Soldier_
    Used to play a "Soldier" card from the hand
    Year_of_Plenty_
    Wrapper class to play a "Year of Plenty" card from your hand
